nodes.text: Kath was a planet in the Dustig sector of the Mid Rim and the Kath homeworld.

This ocean-covered world was subjugated by the Galactic Empire. Imperial forces used a number of the then-new Aquadon CAVa 400 aquatic attack vehicles to make underwater attacks against the forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, who had taken up positions within the Karm Trenches. The subjugation led to extensive civilian causalities.
